mapper.select: select A.iboard,A.title,A.iuser,B.nm,A.created_at createdAt from t_board A inner join t_user B on A.iuser= B.iuser order by A.iboard desc limit #{startIdx},#{row}
select A.iboard,A.title,A.iuser,B.nm,A.created_at createdAt, B.main_pic writerMainPic from t_board A inner join t_user B on A.iuser= B.iuser

select A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt, B.nm writer, B.main_pic writerMainPic ,A.created_at createdAt,A.updated_at updatedAt from t_board A inner join t_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser where A.iboard = #{iboard}
